recipe.title: Arugula, Golden Cherries, Marcona Almonds and Parmigiano-Reggiano
ingredients: 1/2 pound fresh cherries, pitted, or 2 cups frozen pitted cherries, thawed and drained
2 ounces Parmigiano-Reggiano or Grana Padano cheese, thinly shaved (3/4 cup)
3 tablespoons very good extra-virgin olive oil
Flaky coarse sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
instructions: Cut the cherries in half lengthwise and place in a large serving bowl. Add the arugula, cheese and almonds. Drizzle with the oil and vinegar, crush a few generous pinches of salt over the top and season generously with pepper. Toss to combine. Taste and adjust the seasoning, if necessary.
